Overview   Package  Class  Use  Tree  Deprecated  Index  Help 
 PREV PACKAGE   NEXT PACKAGE FRAMES    NO FRAMES    

Package com.github.errantlinguist.latticevisualiser

Interface Summary
Settings Constant settings to be used during visualisation of a word/phone lattice.
 

Class Summary
ArgParser A POSIX-compliant command-line argument parser using the Apache Commons CLI library.
ArgParser.SingletonHolder ArgParser.SingletonHolder is loaded on the first execution of ArgParser.getInstance() or the first access to ArgParser.SingletonHolder.INSTANCE, not before.
Edge A simple WFST edge representation for use in visualisation.
EdgeFontTransformer A Transformer for deriving the Font to use for drawing an edge from the respective Edge characteristics it represents.
EdgeLabelTransformer A Transformer for deriving the label to use for drawing an edge from the respective Edge characteristics it represents.
EdgeLabelTransformer.SingletonHolder EdgeLabelTransformer.SingletonHolder is loaded on the first execution of EdgeLabelTransformer.getInstance() or the first access to EdgeLabelTransformer.SingletonHolder.INSTANCE, not before.
EdgeStrokeTransformer A Transformer for deriving the Stroke to use for drawing an edge from the respective Edge characteristics it represents.
LatticeFileParser A RegexFileParser which creates a DirectedSparseGraph representing a word/phone lattice FST file from the Millennium ASR system.
LatticeVisualiser A simple tool for visualising ASR word/phone lattices from the Millennium ASR system using the JUNG Framework.
StateAspectTransformer A Transformer for deriving the aspect ratio of a vertex drawn to represent a lattice state.
StateAspectTransformer.SingletonHolder StateAspectTransformer.SingletonHolder is loaded on the first execution of StateAspectTransformer.getInstance() or the first access to StateAspectTransformer.SingletonHolder.INSTANCE, not before.
StateFontTransformer A Transformer for deriving the Font to use for drawing the vertex from the characteristics of the state it represents.
StatePaintTransformer A Transformer for deriving the Paint to use for drawing the vertex from the characteristics of the state it represents.
StateShapeTransformer A Transformer for deriving the Shape of a vertex drawn to represent a lattice state.
StateSizeTransformer A Transformer for deriving the size of a vertex drawn to represent a lattice state.
StringLowerCaseTransformer Converts a given string to lowercase.
StringLowerCaseTransformer.SingletonHolder StringLowerCaseTransformer.SingletonHolder is loaded on the first execution of StringLowerCaseTransformer.getInstance() or the first access to StringLowerCaseTransformer.SingletonHolder.INSTANCE, not before.
 

Enum Summary
StateType An Enum of the different types of states, e.g. intermediate, final states.
